# goodt-ui

Docs @ https://goodt-ui.netlify.app/

## Project setup

```
npm install
```

### Compiles and hot-reloads for development

```
npm run serve
```

### Usage

```html
// Example usage in -> MyComponent.vue
<template>
    <div>
        <ui-color-picker></ui-color-picker>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
    import { ColorPicker as UiColorPicker } from 'goodt-ui';

    export default {
        components: {
            UiColorPicker,
        },
    };
</script>
```
